use cricket: select order_id from ordersfood where PID=18
select ORDER_ID,ORDER_NO FROM ORDERSFOOD where PID=3
select * FROM ORDERSFOOD WHERE ORDER_ID in(2,7)
select * from ORDERSFOOD group by ORDER_ID
select * from ORDERSFOOD group by PID
select *,COUNT(*) from ORDERSFOOD group by PID
select PID,COUNT(*) from ORDERSFOOD group by PID
select PID,ORDER_ID,ORDER_NO FROM ORDERSFOOD group by ORDER_ID
SELECT * FROM ORDERSFOOD WHERE ORDER_ID>2 AND PID>=3
SELECT * FROM ORDERSFOOD WHERE (ORDER_ID>2 AND PID>=3) or PID=3
SELECT * FROM ORDERSFOOD WHERE (ORDER_ID>2 AND PID>=3) AND PID=3
SELECT distinct PID from ORDERSFOOD where ORDER_ID =5
select ORDER_NO from ORDERSFOOD order by PID ASC
select * from ORDERSFOOD order by PID ASC
select * from odi_batsman where PLAYER_NAME like 'D%'
select * from odi_batsman where PLAYER_NAME like 'DH%'
select * from odi_batsman where PLAYER_NAME like '%I'
select * from odi_batsman where PLAYER_NAME like '%A%'
select * from odi_batsman where PLAYER_NAME not LIKE 'D%'
select * from odi_batsman where PLAYER_ID in(1,5,6)
select * from odi_batsman where PLAYER_ID not IN(1,5,6)
select * from odi_batsman where SCORE between 15000 and 30000
